CustomField.formula: IF(IF(Send_Formal_Offer_Date__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c <0, NULL, Send_Formal_Offer_Date__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c)>999,NULL,IF(Send_Formal_Offer_Date__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c <0, NULL, Send_Formal_Offer_Date__c - Hiring_Need_Validated_Date__c))
CustomField.label: # Days Hire Valid to Formal Offer
